Description: Traditional homemade Indian chicken curry.

Steps.Instruction: Turn on gas, put cooker on burner, heat for 20–30 sec
Wash chicken and put into bowl
Add oil, turmeric, garam masala, jeera in cooker and stir
Add 2 cups (≈200 ml) water and stir
Add chicken, close lid of cooker
Check if cooked, remove chicken and keep broth aside
If not cooked, repeat boiling step
Add ginger-garlic paste & chicken masala, stir
Add boiled chicken into pan, stir
Cook for 20–30 min until gravy thickens
Turn off gas. Chicken curry is ready

Title: Chicken Curry
